name: getInstallMode
shortDescription: Returns the time left in pairing mode.
description: This method returns the remaining time the central is in pairing mode.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: ID of the family to get the remaining time in pairing mode for. If not specified the remaining time in pairing mode of the first central with pairing mode enabled is returned.

returnValue: Returns the remaining time in pairing mode in seconds or "0" when the central is not in pairing mode.
